comment.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [https://item.gmarket.co.kr/Item?goodscode=2785479596](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fitem.gmarket.co.kr%2FItem%3Fgoodscode%3D2785479596) ### Comment > 제품 상세보기 버튼이 눌리지 않습니다. > > 추가로, AdGuard 추적 보호 필터 (AdGuard Tracking Protection filter) 를 활성화 한 경우 해당 문제가 발생하는 것을 확인하였습니다. ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguard.info/sitereports/qk1wzwi54000cgk888kk080ogggowgkisiczu7y3bw.jpg?nc=1)
Screenshot 1 with AdGuard disabled ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguard.info/sitereports/e4b3t1fd4igcgs0wgsgokccg8w8ckg0fmontrapvlw.jpg?nc=1)
### System configuration Information | Value --- | --- AdGuard product: | AdGuard for Windows v7.20.2 (4988) System version: | Microsoft Windows NT 10.0.19045.0 Browser: | Chrome License type: | paid AdGuard driver: | TDI Tracking protection: | disabled DNS filtering: | server: `System`

issue.title: Google Play: com.flightconnections

labels.name: A: Cannot reproduce
labels.description: Filters devs cannot reproduce this issue

labels.name: A: In progress
labels.description: Work on the issue is in progress

issue.body:

comment.body:
@AdamWr the inital popup is fixed but the banner at the top is still present, also there is a [pop up](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/b12d7256-9de4-4de6-9ea7-20d2b6ffe861) appearing after a while advertising their premium 
also when you select a flight (click any city then another city with a direct connection) there are 2 ads
